transcript.title: Media Releases 1999 From the Prime Minister, The Hon John Howard, MP
transcript.content:
December 1999

* CHOGM Venue - 31 December 1999

* UN Peacekeeping Operation in

East Timor - 30 December 1999

* Australia to Provide an Ex-Customs Vessel

to the Fiji Customs Service - 23 December 1999

* National Approach to Problem Gambling

- 16 December 1999

* New Secretary of the Attorney-General's

Department - 8 December 1999

November 1999

* Community Business Partnership Developing

Practical Ideas to Help Those in Need - 30 November 1999

* Innovation one of the Keys to Australia's

Future - 26 November 1999

* Tough on Drugs Diversion Programme

- 18 November 1999

* Australia-Mandela Scholarships for

South Africa - 15 November 1999

* CHOGM: Australian Initiatives - 15

November 1999

* Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting

- 10 November 1999

* Carr Undercuts Beazley on Republic

- 3 November 1999

* East Timor - 3 November 1999

October 1999

* Eugowra Rural Transaction Centre

- 29 October 1999

* Alice Springs to Darwin Rail Link

- 29 October 1999

* Distortion by Mr Turnbull - 28

October 1999

* The Referendum - 27 October

1999

* New Secretary to the Department of Transport

and Regional Services - 26 October 1999

* Partnership to Assist Fight Against

Breast Cancer

* Republic Referendum - 25 October

1999

* Australian Businesses Recognised

for Employing People with Disabilities - 22 October 1999

* Election of Abdurrahman Wahid as President

of Indonesia - 20 October 1999

* Indonesia's Decision on East Timor

- 20 October 1999

* New Secretary to the Department of

Defence - 18 October 1999

* One Year to go before Sydney 2000 Paralympic

Games - 18 October 1999

* Visit by the Prime Minister of Bangladesh

- 15 October 1999

* Council for the Order of Australia

- 14 October 1999

* New Medals Recognise Ambulance and Emergency

Services - 10 October 1999

* Mr Beazley and East Timor - 4 October

1999

* Mr Keating and East Timor - 4 October

1999

* Fostering Health and Medical Research

- 1 October 1999

September 1999

* ABC Report on East Timor - 29 September

1999

* Taskforce to Develop Practical Assistance

for Youth - 26 September 1999

* Joint Statement with President Kim Dae-Jung

of the Republic of Korea - 17 September 1999

* East Timor - Australia/US Cooperation

- 17 September 1999

* Strengthening the Safety Net in Developing

Economies - 13 September 1999

* Joint Press Release with the Papua New

Guinea Prime Minister,The Rt Hon Sir Mekere Morauta - 10 September

1999

* Urgent Humanitarian Assistance for

Timorese - 10 September 1999

August 1999

* Strong Progress on Millennium Bug

- 31 August 1999

* Eden Regional Forest Agreement

Delivers for Regional Community - 26 August 1999

* Visit by the President of the Republic

of Korea - 24 August 1999

* North East RFA - A Balance Between Jobs

and Environment - 23 August 1999

* Announcement of members of the Prime

Minister's community business partnership - 19 August 1999

* Visit by the President of the People's,

Republic of China - 13 August 1999

* Santos School of Petroleum Engineering

at the University of Adelaide - 13 August 1999

* Proposed Preamble - 11 August

1999

* Referendum Question - 9 August

1999

* Statement by Mrs Janette Howard

- 8 August 1999

* Visit to Australia by the Queen and the

Duke of Edinburgh - 6 August 1999

* Joint Prime Ministerial Task Force

on Australia New Zealand Bilateral Economic Relations; Joint Prime Ministerial

Communique - 4 August 1999

* Joint Communique Between Australia

and New Zealand - 4 August 1999

* New National Medal Regulations

- 4 August 1999

* Sir Allen Brown - 3 August 1999

July 1999

* Memorial Service in Switzerland -

31 July 1999

* Kevin Newman AO - 19 July 1999

* US Restrictions on Australian Lamb Exports

- 8 July 1999

* Joint Statement On Electronic Commerce

- 6 July 1999

* Ministerial Changes - 5

July 1999

* Release Of Coastal Surveillance Reports

- 2 July 1999

June 1999

* $124 Million Boost for the Fight Against

Illegal Immigration - 27 June 1999

* Letter to Senator Lees - 22 June

1999

* New Zealand Memorial - 14 June

1999

* Peace Agreement for Kosovo - 10

June 1999

* Indonesian Elections - 8 June

1999

May 1999

* Changes to the Goods and Services Tax

(GST) - 31 May 1999

* Costing of Commonwealth and States Measures

- 31 May 1999

* Letter to Senator Lees - 31 May

1999

* Tax Reform - 28 May 1999

* Strategy to Promote Australia as a

Centre for Global Financial Services - 18 May 1999

* Australian-American Friendship Week

and Battle of the Coral Sea Commemorations - 7 May 1999

* World Health Organisation Independent

report raises questions over Swiss Heroin Trial - 7 May 1999

* Australian Care Workers - 4 May

1999

April 1999

* ANZAC day - 25 April 1999

* School Shootings in Denver, USA - 21

April 1998

* No Deception on Income Tax -

18 April 1998

* APEC Business Advisory Council - 16

April 1999

* Early Warning Aircraft to be Based

at Williamtown - 15 April 1999

* Prime TV Message - Tax

Reform - 12 April 1999

* Coastal Surveillance Task Force -

12 April 1999

* Intergovernmental Agreement

on the Reform of Commonwealth-State Financial Relations - 9 April

1999

March 1999

* Visit by the Vietnamese

Prime Minister - 29 March 1999

* Demonstrations Against United

States' Consulates - 28 March 1999

* Federal Government Tax Measures

to Encourage Philanthropy - 26 March 1999

* Preamble to the Constitution - 23

March 1999

* Death of Tofilau Dr Eti Alesana

- 21 March 1999

* Tough on Drugs - Treatment Funding

- 18 March 1999

* Federal Government Builds on Commitment

to Cancer Research - 15 March 1999

February 1999

* Father Walter Lini - 21 February

1999

* New Australian Cricket Captain

- 12 February 1999

* Beazley Fails Leadership Test -

11 February 1999

* Visit by the President of Hungary -

9 February 1999

* King Hussein - 8 February 1999

* Visit to New Zealand - 4 February

1999

January 1999
